protein.specific_function: Contributes to the de novo mitochondrial thymidylate biosynthesis pathway.

go_class.description: nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
immortalization of host cell by virus
regulation of transcription involved in G1/S phase of mitotic cell cycle
